syncMasterTemplateOut.query: select * from ( SELECT cdi.DOC_ITEM_ID, cdi.MASTERLIST_ID, cdi.DOCUMENT_ID, cdi.DOCUMENT_CODE, 'I' AS Action FROM cms_document_item cdi, Trans_History trxh WHERE cdi.MASTERLIST_ID = trxh.reference_id AND Trxh.Transaction_Type ='TEMPLATE' AND TRUNC(Trxh.Transaction_Date)=TRUNC(Cdi.Creation_Date) AND Trxh.Tr_History_Id = (SELECT MAX(Tr_History_Id) FROM Trans_History Th WHERE TO_CHAR(th.transaction_date,'DD-MON-YY') = (SELECT To_Date(Param_Value,'DD-Mon-YYYY') FROM Cms_General_Param WHERE Param_Code = 'APPLICATION_DATE' ) AND th.Transaction_Type LIKE 'TEMPLATE' AND th.Reference_Id =cdi.MASTERLIST_ID AND th.Status ='ACTIVE' ) UNION SELECT cdia.DOC_ITEM_ID, cdia.MASTERLIST_ID, cdia.DOCUMENT_ID, cdia.DOCUMENT_CODE , 'D' AS Action FROM cms_document_item_archive cdia, Trans_History trxh WHERE cdia.MASTERLIST_ID = trxh.reference_id AND Trxh.Transaction_Type ='TEMPLATE' AND TRUNC(Trxh.Transaction_Date) =TRUNC(Cdia.Transaction_Date) AND TRUNC(Cdia.Transaction_Date)!=TRUNC(Cdia.Creation_Date) AND Trxh.Tr_History_Id = (SELECT MAX(Tr_History_Id) FROM Trans_History Th WHERE TO_CHAR(th.transaction_date,'DD-MON-YY') = (SELECT To_Date(Param_Value,'DD-Mon-YYYY') FROM Cms_General_Param WHERE Param_Code = 'APPLICATION_DATE' ) AND th.Transaction_Type LIKE 'TEMPLATE' AND th.Reference_Id =cdia.MASTERLIST_ID AND th.Status ='ACTIVE' ) )
